featureType.name: qgis_irmt_408758d8_e6b5_482e_99c4_677c4f4649fe
featureType.title: FOSS4G demonstration - Simplified Inegrated Risk Analysis for Quito
featureType.abstract: A shapefile containing socioeconomic indicators for parroquias of Quito was loaded in QGIS. Loss data exported as csv by the OpenQuake Engine was imported by the IRMT and aggregated by the geometries defined in the shapefile. A hierarchical integrated risk model was defined, combining 3 population-related socioeconomic indicators and 3 economy-related ones. All combined variables were scaled from 0 to 1, to be made commensurable.
